document_data.name: Haronstin Garulth
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|10}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 8: To Venerate The Great Mother}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Haronstin "Leatherjaws" Garulth''' was a [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] with the rank of Close One that resided in the [[Bounty of the Goddess (Voonlar)|Bounty of the Goddess]] temple in [[Voonlar]].
__NOTOC__
document_data.Personality: Haronstin was calm, casual, and carefree.
document_data.Abilities: Leatherjaws was able to consume copious quantities of alcohol without the usual adverse effects.
document_data.Activities: He drove carts and sold seeds for the Bounty.
